# ChainMonitor

>: Tracking Cryptocurrency Key Metrics

## Core Content
- [Bitcoin 4-year cycle](https://chainmonitor.xyz/btc4years): Bitcoin's 4-year halving cycle, historical all-time highs (ATH)
- [BTC Compare](https://chainmonitor.xyz/btcCompare): Bitcoin Compared to Stock Market: Performance & Trends
- [Cryptocurrency L1 and L2](https://chainmonitor.xyz/chainExplorers): Track real-time cryptocurrency trading data, including daily volume, TPS 
- [Stablecoin](https://chainmonitor.xyz/stablecoin): Stablecoin market data,stablecoin comparison, track daily volume, historical highs
